job.title: Web Designer
job.abstract: We offer you with: Medical Allowance Plans, Personal Hours, Special leaves for Birthday, Parent Care, Marriage, Paternity and Volunteer Work, etc.
job.content:
eClass Limited is a well-established IT company based in Hong Kong with eLearning business in Asia Pacific regions. Our software products and services are dynamic and innovative. The reputation of eClass is based on its professional and technical excellence, and most importantly its dedicated working colleagues, in a fun, young and joyful environment.

To meet the fast growing business and the huge demands of the market in different industries and regions, the Marketing and Communications Team of eClass is offering the opportunities to individuals, who are able to provide their expertise in marketing and communicate the concept of eLearning products. Please find more about the company at its website: eClass.com.hk

Everyone matters here. We pride ourselves on having outstanding colleagues and working with meanings and creating values.

Concepts of Work at eClass:

FUN; MEANINGFUL ; CHALLENGING ; WORK-LIFE BALANCE

An accessible workplace location: Millennium City 5, APM (Kwun Tong MTR)


What you’ll do:

  • Creating captivating graphic designs and web layouts for social media campaigns and digital projects.
  • Taking charge of visual design and creative concepts to strengthen brand identity.
  • Generating conceptual wireframes, engaging prototypes, and interactive mockups for web design.
  • Implementing responsive design principles to ensure compatibility across various devices.
  • Bringing ideas to life through expert use of industry-standard design and AI software.
  • Staying abreast of the latest trends in the mobile industry to continuously improve the user experience.

 

Who we're looking for:

  • Higher Diploma or above in Web design or a related field.
  • Demonstrated ability in multimedia, marketing, e-Commerce, B2B, or B2C sectors.
  • Proficient in HTML5 & CSS, bootstrap and responsive design.
  • Strong technical proficiency in industry-standard tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, Sketch, or similar applications.
  • Experience working with system prototypes for mobile and web applications is a plus.
  • Design portfolio must be submitted with the application.

 

What we offer:

Being a Family-Friendly Employer, eClass offers you competitive remuneration package and attractive fringe benefits, including but not limited to Medical Allowance Plans, Well-being Bonus, Personal Hours, Special leaves for Birthday, Parent Care, Marriage, Paternity and Volunteer Work, etc. You will enjoy our work atmosphere with casual dress code, free fruits and snack bar.

Interested candidates, please send your full resume, availability, and last/current and expected salaries to job@eclass.hk. Personal information collected will be used for recruitment purposes only.

(Senior) Finance Manager

We are assisting a local conglomerate in seeking a talented professional to join their growing team as a (Senior) Finance Manager. This role is crucial for their continuous business expansion.

Office Location: Guangdong, China

Responsibilities:

  • Oversee the timely completion of all monthly financial and management reports.
  • Prepare comprehensive financial reports, including budgeting, forecasting, cash flow projections, taxation, treasury, and management reports.
  • Ensure all subsidiaries in Hong Kong, China, and overseas comply with legal and regulatory requirements.
  • Lead and mentor the team to deliver high-quality accounting and finance services.
  • Manage various ad-hoc tasks, including administrative duties as assigned.
  • Coordinate and collaborate with regional team members, external auditors, bankers, and other professionals

  • Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field.
  • Qualified Accountant with HKICPA, HKSA, ACCA, or equivalent certification.
  • Minimum of 5 years of robust finance and accounting experience at a managerial level, ideally within the property industry.
  • Experience with a Big 4 audit firm is advantageous.
  • Strong knowledge of HK and PRC regulatory and tax requirements, with additional regional exposure being a plus.
  • Proficiency in Chinese MS Office applications.

This company offers competitive benefits, including medical insurance eligible for dependents and a generous annual leave entitlement.

job.title: Senior Financial Controller
job.abstract: Must have 15+ years' experience and strong financial market knowledge.
job.content:
Senior Financial Controller

We are a long established and publicly listed company in Hong Kong specializing in the Technology Industry. We also operate R & D and manufacturing in China. Due to our new stage of corporate development, we are now seeking an experienced and independent candidate to join us for spearheading our capital market operations.

 

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree or above in Accounting, Finance or related field with a recognized professional accounting qualification 
  • Qualified member of HKICPA /ACCA or related professional qualifications.
  • Minimum 15 years of relevant post qualification experience in listed/ sizable organizations and work experience in China is essential. Experience in big four CPA firms is preferred
  • Strong understanding of the operation of financial markets and SEC regulations in Hong Kong and PRC
  • Establish and refine finance process and systems to improve the efficiency, accuracy and effectiveness
  • Prior exposure in formulating and improving the internal control framework, identifying key risks and control activities, including system and process development, and assisting the management at all levels to establish and improve risk management and control is a definite advantage

 

Responsibility

  • Lead and manage the finance teams to perform financial accounting, planning and analysis, etc
  • Provide advice from financial impact and opportunity forecasting on new business initiatives
  • Oversee the submission of accuracy and timeliness financial information to comply with relevant listing rules, statutory regulations, and accounting standards.
  • Collaborate with senior managements of subsidiaries in Mainland China and Hong Kong to achieve business objectives.
  • Supervise the company secretary for corporate secretarial work, including drafting of announcement and arrangement of board meetings.
  • Develop and execute financial strategies, including cash management, merger and acquisition projects and fund raising in capital market.
  • Monitor the financial risks of the company and safeguard the shareholders’ interests.

 

Personal Attributes

  • Strong business sense, proven management, analytical and leadership skills.
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills and ability to collaborate with all departments in an organization.
  • Tactful and Assertive
  • High degree of responsibility, teamwork as well as strong ability in communication, planning and coordination.
  • Result oriented to get objectives timely achieved
  • Regular travel to China is required

 

Personal data will be used for recruitment purposes only.

job.title: Brand Executive / Senior Brand Executive
job.abstract: As Brand Executive to join our team who can share our believe, and deliver the emotional satisfactions to our customers.
job.content:
Responsibilities:

  • Support on formulating strategic marketing and communication plan to achieve sales growth, in particular digital and product marketing tactics, PR communications and CRM initiatives etc.;
  • Assist to build relationship with influencers, media and potential parties from lifestyle / creative / other luxury sectors for brand growth opportunities, including awareness building, lead generation and partnership liaison;
  • Give assistance to product management from product forecast, purchasing, scheduling, inventory control and stock allocation for supporting sales optimization;
  • Work closely with internal stakeholders such as retail team and merchandising team to review sales performance, product assortments, pricing strategies and sales forecast through varies point-of-sales to achieve brand KPI results;
  • Responsible for preparing marketing reports and data analysis, gather insights in customer behavior and business trend to crystallize brand strategic executions ;
  • Other ad hoc duties as assigned

 Requirements:

  • Graduated in Marketing/ Business Administration/ Language or other relevant discipline
  • Prior working experience in fashion/beauty/lifestyle field is preferred.
  • Passionate in discovering niche brands, brand building and attention to details
  • Good marketing sense in social media channels.
  • Strong willingness to learn, a good team player and enjoy striving in a fast-pace environment
  • Excellent communication skills, good command of spoken and written skills in Cantonese, Mandarin and English
  • Proficiency in MS Office, MS Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Chinese word processing, , familiar use of Adobe Suite is a plus.


What We Offer:

As a caring company, we are committed to providing engaging and work-life balance environment, competitive remuneration, comprehensive fringe benefits, and progressive career opportunities to our people.    

Our benefits include: 

  •        Flexible working hours
  •        Up to 20 days Annual Leave per year
  •        Marriage Leave
  •        Full Paid Sick Leave
  •        Jury Leave
  •        Bereavement Leave
  •        Early Leave for Doctor Consultation
  •        Medical Insurance
  •        Dental Insurance
  •        Free Products
  •        Staff Discounts
  •        Wedding Bonus
  •        Newborn Bonus
  •        On-the-job training
  •        Referral Bonus

How To Apply:

Interested parties please click “Apply Now” to send your full resume (in Microsoft Word or PDF format), current and expected salary to us for review.

Applicants not invited for interview within 4 weeks may assume their application unsuccessful. All information will be treated in strictest confidence and used solely for recruitment purpose.

job.title: Senior Executive – Marketing & Communication
job.abstract: Support the planning, implementation, and evaluation of marketing/communications campaigns and activities
job.content:
About the Sports Centre:

Situated in Sai Sha, the forthcoming outdoor multi-sports facility will be the largest privately owned outdoor sports centre in Hong Kong upon completion. The state-of-the-art sports venue will offer a wide range of outdoor sports amenities and training facilities. The Centre aims to become a hub for sports in Hong Kong and the wider Greater Bay Area. We are currently seeking talented individuals to join our team and help us realize this vision.

 

Job Responsibilities:

  • Support the planning, implementation, and evaluation of marketing/communications campaigns and activities
  • Manage social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram and Xiaohongshu
  • Manage agencies and designers to develop creative works and promotional materials
  • Write, edit and disseminate a variety of communications including press releases, website content, and newsletter
  • Coordinate with service providers to promote various programs and events
  • Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to enhance brand exposure
  • Assist the Team Lead in preparing management reports
  • Handle ad hoc tasks assigned by the Team Lead
  • Act as a sports ambassador for GO PARK Sports

 

Job Requirements:

  • Higher Diploma or above in marketing or communications
  • 3-5 years of solid experience in marketing/communication
  • Experience in managing creative/design agencies
  • Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (e.g., In-design, Illustrator and Photoshop)
  • Experience in the sports industry will be a big advantage
  • Passionate and knowledgeable about a wide variety of sports
  • Energetic, outgoing and active
  • Creative and innovative with aesthetic sense
  • ⁠Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (e.g. In-design, Illustrator and Photoshop)
  • Proficient in managing social media platforms (e.g. Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn)
  • Excellent command of spoken & written English & Chinese
  • Excellent interpersonal communication skills
  • ⁠Excellent time management and multitasking skills

 

We offer an attractive remuneration package with fringe benefits to the right candidate, such as:

  • 5 days work week
  • Discretionary bonus
  • Complimentary Annual Sports Pass
  • Medical insurance
  • Other allowances

 

Interested parties please send detailed resume with current & expected salaries via “Apply Now”.

 

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purpose only.
